title: Oriental Institute Publications
aka: University of Chicago Oriental Institute Publications
additional-notes: The earliest issue renewal noted here is for the earliest active renewal record to specifically mention Oriental Institute Publications.  It was filed under Books, not Periodicals.  Before concluding a volume before or after this one is in the public domain, search for renewals for the volume under its distinctive title. We have not systematically checked volume titles for this serial.

Volumes were not published in numerical order. Some volumes with higher numbers than 7 were published before 1931 and are now public domain. Do a renewal check for the copyright of any volume published in 1932 or later.
